title: Gustavinho
text: Gustavo Nacarato Veronesi (born 7 May 1982, in <a href="Alagoinhas">Alagoinhas</a>) is a retired <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. In 2010 he played for <a href="FC%20Rapid%20Bucure%C8%99ti">Rapid București</a> in <a href="Liga%20I">Liga I</a>.
